Summary: I think it was a plane but the unusual thing about it was that it was flying almost straight down and then made a sharp turn
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Pasadena
There were no other sightings in Pasadena on or around February 27th 1984
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing on my front porch smoking a ciggarette. I looked west and saw a plane-like vehicle. The lights were similar to a plane but it was flying almost straight down and then it made a sharp turn. It was east from where I was but it was to far to see exactly what it was. I was terrified in a way because I believed it was going to crash. Like I claim I really believe it was a plane it still boggles me. It may have been a malfunction. I lost sight of the object when it flew behind view of the trees.
